sentences.english: For example listen to this blue whale song from the year 1964.
sentences.chinese: 例如，請聽1964年的藍鯨之歌。

sentences.english: Now nobody is allowed to kill the blue whales.
sentences.chinese: 過去人們常常爲了鯨肉和鯨油殺害藍鯨。

sentences.english: Blue Whale my back was light blue, belly full of folds, with ocher color macula.
sentences.chinese: 藍鯨背脊呈淺藍色，肚皮佈滿褶皺，帶有赭石色黃斑。

sentences.english: It is this population that may allow the blue whale to rebuild its workforce.
sentences.chinese: 這部分人口可能使藍鯨，以重建其勞動力。

sentences.english: Blue Whale is the biggest in Minke whales.
sentences.chinese: 藍鯨是須鯨中最大的一種。

sentences.english: The blue whale's whistle is the loudest noise made by an animal.
sentences.chinese: 藍鯨發出的口哨聲是動物界能發出最大的聲音。

sentences.english: Dunbar's new band was Blue Whale and had a sole holdover from the drummer's previous combo, Tommy Eyre.
sentences.chinese: 鄧巴的新樂隊是藍鯨，並有唯一之前的鼓手推薦的。

sentences.english: That’s according to John Hildebrand of the Scripps Institution of Oceanography in San Diego. He published a 2009 study on whale songs.
sentences.chinese: 希爾德布蘭在09年發佈了一篇關於藍鯨之歌的研究。

definition: to keep one's calm in the face of the unexpected/not to wonder at strange sights
turtle/Internet slang for 海歸|海归[hai3 gui1]
